issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with three mural elements; covered korymbos, plain diadem, diadem ribbons commencing above ball of hair; pointing upwards; small cheek flaps; neck-line of tunica edged with double row of pearls; dotted border
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with parallel strockes; to the left and right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Shapur I with korymbos, facing outwards, holding lance in right and left hand respectively, left and right hand respectively resting on scabbard, dotted border
issue_references_s: SNS  Style A or A/ter Type IIc/2a
